--[[ 어둠의 종속자 --]]
function NPC_111003:Init(NPCID) NPC_ReserveUserData(NPCID, 2);
NPC_111003.LimitForBreakParts = NPC_111003.MaxHP/15
NPC_111003.TalIdSpiltWeb = 211100307 NPC_111003.TalIdAroundWeb1 = 211100313 NPC_111003.TalIdAroundWeb2 = 211100314 NPC_111003.TalIdPain1 = 211100312 NPC_111003.TalIdRoar = 211100308 NPC_111003.TalIdHeal = 211100306 NPC_111003.TalIdJump = 211100303 NPC_111003.TalIdWhirl = 211100304
NPC_111003.TalIdPain2 = 211100318 NPC_111003.TalIdImmunity1 = 211100319 NPC_111003.TalIdImmunity2 = 211100320
NPC_111003.PartIdJawL = 3 NPC_111003.PartIdJawR = 4 end
function NPC_111003:phase1_buff_dead(ThisNPC, Enemy) ThisNPC:RemoveBuff( 88020 ) ThisNPC:RemoveBuff( 88022 ) end
function NPC_111003:phase2_buff_dead(ThisNPC, Enemy) ThisNPC:RemoveBuff( 88024 ) ThisNPC:RemoveBuff( 88025 ) end
-- 랜덤으로 캐릭터에게 디버프사용 function NPC_111003:phase3_debuff( ThisActor, Enemy ) --GLog( "NPC_111003:phase3_debuff\n" ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor)
local NewEnemy = ThisNPC:Aggro( "random", 0 ) if ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_111003.TalIdImmunity1 ) then return end if ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_111003.TalIdImmunity2 ) then return end
ThisNPC:NarrationNow("$$COLT_0111003_204") ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_111003.TalIdImmunity1, NewEnemy ) NewEnemy:RemoveBuff( 88030 ) NewEnemy:RemoveBuff( 88033 ) ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_111003.TalIdImmunity2, Enemy ) --ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_111003.TalIdPain2, Enemy )
end
function NPC_111003:OnYell(RequestNPC, TargetActor) this:Assist(RequestNPC) end
function NPC_111003:Healing(ThisNPC, Opponent) if ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_111003.TalIdHeal ) then return end
if ThisNPC:GetHP()/ThisNPC:GetMaxHP() == 1 then return end
--if ThisNPC:CheckBPart( NPC_111003.PartIdJawL ) and ThisNPC:CheckBPart( NPC_111003.PartIdJawR ) then -- return --end
ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_111003.TalIdHeal ) end
-- Talent Callback Func function NPC_111003:OnFinishAndAggroSwap( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor )
ThisNPC:Aggro( "short", 0 ) end
--- function NPC_111003:CheckBreakpart(HitInfo, bFrontPart) local ThisNPC = HitInfo.Victim local hpRate = ThisNPC:GetHP()/ThisNPC:GetMaxHP()
local currentTalent = ThisNPC:GetCurrentTalent() if currentTalent == NPC_111003.TalIdPain1 or currentTalent == NPC_111003.TalIdRoar then return HitInfo end
if (bFrontPart == true and (ThisNPC:CheckBPart(3) == false or ThisNPC:CheckBPart(4) == false)) then -- 전면 누적치 local frontDamage = ThisNPC:GetUserData(1) + HitInfo.Damage
if (frontDamage >= NPC_111003.LimitForBreakParts) then if (ThisNPC:CheckBPart(3) == false) then ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:BreakPart(3, HitInfo.Attacker) ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_111003.TalIdPain1 ) frontDamage = 0 elseif (ThisNPC:CheckBPart(4) == false) then ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:BreakPart(4, HitInfo.Attacker) ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf(NPC_111003.TalIdPain1) frontDamage = 0 end end
ThisNPC:SetUserData(1, frontDamage) else -- 후면 누적치 local rearDamage = ThisNPC:GetUserData(2) + HitInfo.Damage if rearDamage >= NPC_111003.LimitForBreakParts and (ThisNPC:CheckBPart(1) == false or ThisNPC:CheckBPart(2) == false) then if (ThisNPC:CheckBPart(1) == false) then ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:BreakPart(1, HitInfo.Attacker) ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf(NPC_111003.TalIdPain1) rearDamage = 0 elseif(ThisNPC:CheckBPart(2) == false) then ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:BreakPart(2, HitInfo.Attacker) ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf(NPC_111003.TalIdPain1) rearDamage = 0 end end
ThisNPC:SetUserData(2, rearDamage) end
return HitInfo end
function NPC_111003:OnHitCapsule_0_0(HitInfo) return NPC_111003:CheckBreakpart(HitInfo, true) end
function NPC_111003:OnHitCapsule_1_0(HitInfo) return NPC_111003:CheckBreakpart(HitInfo, true) end
function NPC_111003:OnHitCapsule_2_0(HitInfo) return NPC_111003:CheckBreakpart(HitInfo, true) end
function NPC_111003:OnHitCapsule_3_0(HitInfo) return NPC_111003:CheckBreakpart(HitInfo, true) end
function NPC_111003:OnHitCapsule_1_1(HitInfo) return NPC_111003:CheckBreakpart(HitInfo, false) end
-- NPC111003_Stressed function NPC_111003:Stressed(ThisNPC, Enemy) ThisNPC:Aggro("short", 0)
local Dist = ThisNPC:DistanceTo( Enemy ) if Dist < 400 and not ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_111003.TalIdWhirl ) then
ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_111003.TalIdWhirl ) end end
